title: error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `Vec<u8>: std::marker::Send`

That's strange, which compiler version are you using? What does `rustc --version` return in the directory `~/ethereum/lighthouse`?

I can't reproduce this issue locally, so it's likely a caching issue or a compiler version issue.

Other things to try:

- `cargo clean`
- `rm -r ~/.cargo/registry/cache`

abdullah@dell:~/ethereum/lighthouse$ rustc --version
rustc 1.66.0-nightly (758f19645 2022-10-24)


and i try 
- `cargo clean`
- `rm -r ~/.cargo/registry/cache`

but find the same error.
Try the stable compiler, 1.64.0. You can install it with `rustup toolchain add stable` and then set it as default with `rustup default stable`.

Closing in favour of https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/3695 which is pinned and provides a more concise summary.
